subtitle.Text: You know that feeling, where the first moment you see someone it's like they have a big gold star around them,
and you HAVE to get to know them?
Well, there's this girl, I think she's a senior, she's usually dressed... kind of punk? But sometimes I see her in this, like, Army uniform?
and she's always drawing in this notebook, looking so intense.
I had no idea how I would ever, like, have an excuse to talk to her...
'Til I noticed she and her friends hang out and play Street Fighter at the 7-11 every day after school...
